00035 template<typename F>
00036 void ColumnSum( const Matrix<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& sums )
00037 {
00038   //    DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnSum"))
00039   //typedef Base<F> Real;
00040     const Int m = X.Height();
00041     const Int n = X.Width();
00042     const F* XBuf = X.LockedBuffer();
00043     const Int XLDim = X.LDim();
00044 
00045     sums.Resize( n, 1 );
00046     Base<F>* sumsBuf = sums.Buffer();
00047     for( Int j=0; j<n; ++j )
00048     {
00049       for( Int i=0; i<m; ++i )
00050         sumsBuf[j] += XBuf[i+j*XLDim];
00051     }
00052 }

00079 
00080 template<typename F,Dist U,Dist V>
00081 void ColumnSum
00082 ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& A, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& sums )
00083 {
00084   //    DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnSum"))
00085     const Int n = A.Width();
00086     sums.AlignWith( A );
00087     sums.Resize( n, 1 );
00088     ColumnSum( A.LockedMatrix(), sums.Matrix() );
00089     AllReduce( sums.Matrix(), A.ColComm(), mpi::SUM );
00090 }
00091 
00092 template<typename F>
00093 void ColumnMax( const Matrix<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms )
00094 {
00095   //    DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnMax"))
00096     typedef Base<F> Real;
00097     const Int m = X.Height();
00098     const Int n = X.Width();
00099     const F* XBuf = X.LockedBuffer();
00100     const Int XLDim = X.LDim();
00101 
00102     norms.Resize( n, 1 );
00103     Base<F>* normBuf = norms.Buffer();
00104     for( Int j=0; j<n; ++j )
00105     {
00106         Real colMax = 0;
00107         for( Int i=0; i<m; ++i )
00108             colMax = Max(colMax,XBuf[i+j*XLDim]);
00109         normBuf[j] = colMax;
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 template<typename F,Dist U,Dist V>
00114 void ColumnMax
00115 ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& A, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& norms )
00116 {
00117   //    DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnMax"))
00118     const Int n = A.Width();
00119     norms.AlignWith( A );
00120     norms.Resize( n, 1 );
00121     ColumnMax( A.LockedMatrix(), norms.Matrix() );
00122     AllReduce( norms.Matrix(), A.ColComm(), mpi::MAX );
00123 }
00124 
00125 template<typename F>
00126 void ColumnMax( const DistMultiVec<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms )
00127 {
00128   //    DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnMax"))
00129     ColumnMax( X.LockedMatrix(), norms );
00130     AllReduce( norms, X.Comm(), mpi::MAX );
00131 }
00132 
00133 template<typename F>
00134 void ColumnMax( const SparseMatrix<F>& A, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms )
00135 {
00136   //    DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnMax"))
00137     // Explicitly forming the transpose is overkill...
00138     // The following would be correct but is best avoided.
00139     /*
00140     SparseMatrix<F> ATrans;
00141     Transpose( A, ATrans );
00142     RowMaxNorms( ATrans, norms );
00143     */
00144 
00145     // Form the maxima
00146     // ---------------
00147     typedef Base<F> Real;
00148     Zeros( norms, A.Width(), 1 );
00149 
00150     const Int numEntries = A.NumEntries();
00151     const Int* colBuf = A.LockedTargetBuffer();
00152     const F* values = A.LockedValueBuffer();
00153     Real* normBuf = norms.Buffer(); 
00154     for( Int e=0; e<numEntries; ++e )
00155         normBuf[colBuf[e]] = Max(normBuf[colBuf[e]],values[e]);
00156 }
00157 
00158 template<typename F>
00159 void ColumnMax
00160 ( const DistSparseMatrix<F>& A, DistMultiVec<Base<F>>& norms )
00161 {
00162   //DEBUG_ONLY(CSE cse("ColumnMax"))
00163     typedef Base<F> Real;
00164     // Explicitly forming the transpose is overkill...
00165     // The following would be correct but is best avoided.
00166     /*
00167     DistSparseMatrix<F> ATrans(A.Comm());
00168     Transpose( A, ATrans );
00169     RowMaxNorms( ATrans, norms );
00170     */
00171 
00172     // Modify the communication pattern from an adjoint Multiply
00173     // =========================================================
00174     Zeros( norms, A.Width(), 1 );
00175     // TODO: (Moon 9/12/16) I replaced the commented code since
00176     // Elemental no longer has a DistSparseMultMeta class. I do not
00177     // know if the code is correct.
00178     // A.InitializeMultMeta();
00179     // const auto& meta = A.multMeta;
00180     const auto& meta = A.InitializeMultMeta();
00181 
00182     // Pack the send values 
00183     // --------------------
00184     vector<Real> sendVals( meta.numRecvInds, 0 );
00185     const Int numEntries = A.NumLocalEntries();
00186     const F* values = A.LockedValueBuffer();
00187     for( Int e=0; e<numEntries; ++e )
00188         sendVals[meta.colOffs[e]] = 
00189           Max(sendVals[meta.colOffs[e]],values[e]);
00190 
00191     // Inject the updates into the network
00192     // -----------------------------------
00193     const Int numRecvInds = meta.sendInds.size();
00194     vector<Real> recvVals( numRecvInds );
00195     mpi::AllToAll
00196     ( sendVals.data(), meta.recvSizes.data(), meta.recvOffs.data(),
00197       recvVals.data(), meta.sendSizes.data(), meta.sendOffs.data(),
00198       A.Comm() );
00199 
00200     // Form the maxima over all the values received
00201     // --------------------------------------------
00202     const Int firstLocalRow = norms.FirstLocalRow();
00203     Real* normBuf = norms.Matrix().Buffer();
00204     for( Int s=0; s<numRecvInds; ++s )
00205     {
00206         const Int i = meta.sendInds[s];
00207         const Int iLoc = i - firstLocalRow;
00208         normBuf[iLoc] = Max(normBuf[iLoc],recvVals[s]);
00209     }
00210 }
